projects.projectDesc: My portfolio for storing information and links to my projects. I used this project as an opportunity to learn a few new frameworks.

projectTech.name: NextJS
projectTech.desc: NextJS is a React framework, I decided to learn it to expand my capabilities with React and to see if I enjoyed using it as a development enviroment.

projectTech.name: TailwindCSS
projectTech.desc: Tailwind is a CSS framework designed to speed up the styling process, I decided to learn this to develop my CSS abilities and because a lot of modern apps use CSS frameworks

projectTech.name: Material Tailwind
projectTech.desc: Material Tailwind is an addon to Tailwind that includes a component library, useful for adding things like image sliders and modals

projects.projectDesc: A full stack music website including a login system, persistent login, password hashing, Spotify API, a persistent radio player and a home page with music news and events personalized to the user based on their saved favourites

projectTech.name: SQL
projectTech.desc: Used to store user data on MongoDB

projectTech.name: BCrypt
projectTech.desc: A module used to encrypt data

projectTech.name: Express
projectTech.desc: Express is a back end web application framework, we used it to build our RESTful APIs

projects.projectDesc: This was a personal project with the goal of learning a new and interesting way to create websites.

projectTech.name: ThreeJS
projectTech.desc: ThreeJS functions as a game engine and allows animated 3D computer graphics to run in a web browser, requires browser hardware acceleration to run

projects.projectDesc: An E-Commerce website, includes searching using various API's to generate fake data, results sorting and a basket system.

projectTech.name: Bootstrap
projectTech.desc: Bootstrap is a CSS framework, we experimented with it in this project in a few areas, mainly in the navbar

projects.projectDesc: App for checking the weather in any city via an API, features a register and login system, persistent login and password hashing.

projectTech.name: React
projectTech.desc: React is a front-end JavaScript library

projects.projectDesc: Work done while learning Test Driven Development

projectTech.name: Jest
projectTech.desc: Jest is a JavaScript testing framework, tests are useful for assuring your app is working as intented.

projectTech.name: Typescript
projectTech.desc: Typescript adds static typing to JavaScript. I used this testing project as an opportunity to get some experience using typescript.

projects.projectDesc: A simple to do list with an easy to use colour coded UI

projectTech.name: React
projectTech.desc: React is a front-end JavaScript library

projects.projectDesc: A calculator app including thorough error checking and handling

projectTech.name: React
projectTech.desc: React is a front-end JavaScript library

projects.projectDesc: First player to reach 21 wins, roll a 1 and you lose. Dynamic design allows unlimited amount of players.

projectTech.name: JavaScript
projectTech.desc: A programming language used to develop the logic in websites

projectTech.name: HTML
projectTech.desc: Stands for HyperText Markup Language, it defines the content and structure of web content

projectTech.name: CSS
projectTech.desc: Stands for Cascading Style Sheets, used in the styling and presentation of web pages.

projects.projectDesc: An API created using Express, Sequelize and MySQL

projectTech.name: Sequelize
projectTech.desc: Sequelize is an Object Relational Mapper that makes it easy to work with databases.
